text: Helmut Oswald Maucher (9 December 1927 – 5 March 2018) was a German businessman. He served as the CEO of Nestlé from June 1990 to June 1997. He was born in Eisenharz (Allgäu), Germany. Maucher died in Berlin on 5 March 2018 at the age of 90. ==Bibliography== * La stratégie Nestlé, French translation by Monique Thiollet, Maxima Ed., Paris, 1995, ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German businesspeople
title: Helmut Maucher
